Child Property: Additive Antiblock, Slip/Release Agent, PET Handling Aid
Information:
Antiblock agents appear on the film surface as rough particles giving an uneven surface to the film and through that reduce the contact surface. 
Slip/Release Agent reduce the adhesion of preforms, facilitating mold release and reducing damage and abrasion in handling.
PET Handling Aid aids are used to prevent PET bottles binding or sticking to themselves or other surfaces during handling. In Hair Care as of 2021 they are generally liquids sprayed onto blown bottles post molding
